title_en: NOTE ON A RAINY NIGHT TO A FRIEND IN THE NORTH
paragraphs_en: You ask me when I am coming. I do not know.
I dream of your mountains and autumn pools brimming all night with the rain.
Oh, when shall we be trimming wicks again, together in your western window?
When shall I be hearing your voice again, all night in the rain?

There's a poet at Maoling sick in the rain.

Yet she dreads the spring, blowing cold in the palace,
When her husband, a Knight of the Golden Tortoise,
Will leave her sweet bed, to be early at court.

Hears The Yellow Bamboo Song shaking the whole earth.
Where is Emperor Mu, with his eight horses running
Ten thousand miles a day? Why has he never come back?

And the River of Heaven slants and the morning stars are low,
Are you sorry for having stolen the potion that has set you
Over purple seas and blue skies, to brood through the long nights?

He found no calmer wisdom than that of young Jia
And assigned him the foremost council-seat at midnight,
Yet asked him about gods, instead of about people.

title_en: SHE SIGHS ON HER JADE LUTE
paragraphs_en: A cool-matted silvery bed; but no dreams....
An evening sky as green as water, shadowed with tender clouds;
But far off over the southern rivers the calling of a wildgoose,
And here a twelve-story building, lonely under the moon.

That passion unforgettable through all the suns and moons
They had led him to forsake her by reminding him
Of an emperor slain with his lady once, in a well at Jingyang Palace.

Her vermilion screen with its pattern of flowers,
Her eight-foot dragon-beard mat and her quilt brocaded in squares
Are ready now for nights that are neither warm nor cold.

While ghosts of the Six Dynasties pass like a dream
Around the Forbidden City, under weeping willows
Which loom still for three miles along the misty moat.

On the desert, clad in sable and silk, five thousand of them fell....

And the causeway gleams with willows, and wheatfields wave in the wind,

title_en: A SONG OF AN AUTUMN NIGHT
paragraphs_en: Under the crescent moon a light autumn dew
Has chilled the robe she will not change --
And she touches a silver lute all night,
Afraid to go back to her empty room.

title_en: A SIGH IN THE COURT OF PERPETUAL FAITH
paragraphs_en: She brings a broom at dawn to the Golden Palace doorway
And dusts the hall from end to end with her round fan,
And, for all her jade-whiteness, she envies a crow
Whose cold wings are kindled in the Court of the Bright Sun.

Staying by the Yellow River at dusk,
I don't hear my parents calling out to me,
But I heard the sound and splashing of the Yellow River flowing water.
As I bid farewell to the Yellow River,
At dusk, at the head of Heishan Mountain,
I don't hear my parents calling out to me,
But I heard the sound of Yanshan Hu riding and chirping.
Traveling thousands of miles to the military,
Guanshan Du is like flying.
Shuo Qi transmits the golden watchtower,
The cold light shines on the iron coat.
The general died in countless battles,
The hero returned in ten years.
Returning to meet the emperor,
The emperor sits in the bright hall.
Ce Xun's Twelve Revolutions,
Reward over a hundred thousand.
Khan asked what he wanted,
Mulan doesn't need a Shangshulang,
May I travel a thousand miles,
Send my child back to his hometown.
Ye Niang heard the girl coming,
Departing from Guo to support the general;
Sister, upon hearing her arrival,
Apply red makeup to the household;
Little brother, upon hearing my sister's arrival,
Sharpen the knife vigorously towards pigs and sheep.
Open the door of my East Pavilion,
Sitting on my West Pavilion bed,
Take off my wartime robe,
Wearing my old clothes.
When the window trims the temples,
Mirror sticker flower yellow.
When I went out to see my companions,
they were all surprised :
I had been with them for twelve years,
but I didn't know Mulan was a girl.
The male rabbit's feet pounce on the Shuo,
Female rabbit eyes blurred;
Two rabbits walking on the ground,
Can you tell if I am a male or female?

Drinking alone without a blind date.
Raise a glass to invite the bright moon,
Paiying becomes three people.
The moon does not dissolve its drink,
The Shadow Follows Me.
Accompanying the moon for a while,
Joy must come in spring.
I sing the moon wandering,
My dancing is messy.
When awake, socialize together,
After getting drunk, disperse separately.
Eternal knot merciless tour,

title_en: Walking Horse Chuan Xingfeng Sending Out Shi Xizheng
paragraphs_en: Have you not seen me walking by the snowy seaside in Machuan,
The flat sand, vast expanse, and yellow enter the sky.
In September, the wind roars at night,
A river of gravel is as big as a bucket,
Strolling on the ground with stones in the wind.
The Xiongnu grass is yellow and the horse is plump,
To the west of Jinshan, smoke and dust fly,
The great general of the Han family departed from the west.
The general's golden armor never falls off at night,
In the middle of the night, the army marched and fought against each other,
The wind is as sharp as a blade.
Horse hair steamed with snow and sweat,
Five flowers with money spinning into ice,
In the curtain, grass calls and inkstone water condenses.
Upon hearing this, the Lu cavalry responded with courage and deterrence,
Unexpectedly, short soldiers dare not take over,
Che Shi stands at the west gate offering victory.

The struggle between guests and chickens.
Drive the chickens up the trees,
At first, I heard the sound of knocking on the firewood bush.
Four or five elders,
Ask me how long I have traveled.
Each has its own carry,
Pour out the impurities and clear up.
Mo Ci, the taste of wine is thin,
No one cultivates the millet field.
The war never ceased,
Children will march eastward.
Please sing an old song for your father: Difficulty, shame, and deep affection!
After singing, I looked up at the sky and sighed,
The four seats are filled with tears.

paragraphs_en: In the cold autumn of independence,
To the north of the Xiangjiang River,
Orange Island Head.
Watching thousands of mountains turn red,
All the layers of forest are dyed;
The river is clear and transparent,
Hundred boats compete for excellence.
Eagle strikes the sky,
Fish soar on the shallow bottom,
All kinds of frost compete for freedom.
Feeling desolate and desolate,
Ask the vast earth,
Who controls the ups and downs?
Bring a hundred couples for a trip,
Recalling the turbulent times of the past.
Just like a young classmate,
In its prime;
Scholarly spirit,
Be bold and powerful.
Guide the country,
Encouraging words,
The feces and soil were once a thousand feudal lords.
Have you ever remembered,
To hit the water at mid flow,
Waves stop flying boats?

title_en: Shui Long · Deng Jiankang Jiuxin Pavilion
paragraphs_en: The Chu sky is a thousand miles clear autumn,
Water flows with the sky, autumn is boundless.
Far and wide, far and wide,
Offering sorrow and offering hatred,
Jade hairpin and spiral bun.
At the head of the sunset tower,
In the sound of Duanhong,
Jiangnan wanderers.
Take a look at Wu Gou,
Take a photo of the railing,
No one knows,
Deng Linyi.
Let's not say that the sea bass is worth savoring,
As the west wind blows,
Has Ji Ying returned yet?
Seeking land and asking for mercy,
Afraid of being ashamed to see,
Liu Lang is talented.
Unfortunately, fleeting years,
Sad wind and rain,
The tree is still like this!
Who calls Qian,
Red scarf and green sleeves,
Find hero tears!

Chengjiang has a clear moon.

title_cnt: 八聲甘州·對瀟瀟暮雨灑江天
title_en: Eight sounds of Ganzhou · Xiao Xiaomu rains on the river
paragraphs_en: To the drizzling evening rain that falls on the river,
Wash the autumn season thoroughly.
Gradually frosty and the wind mournful,
The Guanhe River is deserted,
The remaining photos are on the same floor.
It is a place of decline and decay,
Time flies and things rest in glory.
Only the Yangtze River water,
Silent flows eastward.
Unable to bear to climb high and face the distance,
Looking at the misty hometown,
Homesickness is hard to bear.
Sighing for the traces of the past year,
Why bother to stay submerged?
Looking at the beauty dressing room,
After a few mistakes, I will return to the boat in the sky.
Strive to know me,
At the position of the leaning rod,
It's so poignant!
